STEPDEF.VALUE: __math__sum_{n__eq__0}^{oo} z_k__math__ ist eine absolut konvergente unendlichen Reihe mit Grenzwert __math__g__math__.
__math__sum_{n__eq__0}^{oo} w_k__math__ ist eine Umordnung der unendlichen Reihe __math__sum_{n__eq__0}^{oo} z_{n}__math__.
Die Umordnung __math__sum_{n__eq__0}^{oo} w_k__math__ konvergiert ebenfalls gegen __math__g__math__.

Def (Umordnung): Eine unendliche Reihe __math__sum_{n__eq__0}^{oo}w_k__math__ ist eine Umordnung der unendlichen Reihe __math__sum_{n__eq__0}^{oo} z_{n}__math____co__ wenn es eine bijektive Abbildung __math__sigma: NN_0 -__gt__ NN_0__math__ gibt mit: __math__AA_{n in NN_0} : w_{sigma(n)} __eq__ z_n__math__

Def (Konvergenz Reihe): Eine Reihe __math__sum_{n__eq__0}^{oo} a_{n}__math__ konvergiert__co__ wenn die Partialsummenfolge __math__(s_n)_{n in NN_0}__math__ mit __math__s_n :__eq__ sum_{k__eq__0}^{n} a_{k}__math__ konvergiert.
__math__AA_(a__co__b__co__c in M) : a * (b + c) __eq__ a * b + a * c__math__
__math__AA_(a__co__b__co__c in M) : (a + b) + c __eq__ a + (b + c)__math__
__math__AA_(a__co__b in M) : a * b __eq__ b * c __math__
__math__AA_(a__co__b in CC) : |a + b| __lt____eq__ |a| + |b| __math__
__math__sigma: NN_0 -__gt__ NN_0__math__ ist die bijektive Abbildung der Umordnung __math__AA_{n in NN_0} : w_{sigma(n)} __eq__ z_n__math__
Sei __math__(t_n)_{n in NN_0}__math__ mit __math__t_n :__eq__ sum_{k__eq__0}^{n} w_{k}__math__ die Partialsummenfolge zur Reihe __math__sum_{k__eq__0}^{oo} w_{k}__math__.
Sei __math__g__math__ der Grenzwert der Partialsummenfolge __math__(s_n)_{n in NN_0}__math__ mit __math__s_n :__eq__ sum_{k__eq__0}^{n} z_{k}__math__ f__ue__r alle __math__n in NN_0__math__.
__math__AA_{epsilon __gt__ 0} EE_{n_1 in NN_0} AA_{n __gt____eq__ n_1}: |s_n -g| __eq__ | sum_{k__eq__n + 1}^{oo} z_{k} | __lt__ epsilon/2__math__

Sei __math__g_a__math__ der Grenzwert der absoluten Partialsummenfolge __math__(a_n)_{n in NN_0}__math__ mit __math__a_n :__eq__ sum_{k__eq__0}^{n} |z_{k}|__math__ f__ue__r alle __math__n in NN_0__math__.
__math__AA_{epsilon __gt__ 0} EE_{n_2 in NN_0} AA_{n __gt____eq__ n_2}: |a_n -g| __eq__ | sum_{k__eq__n+1}^{oo} | z_{k} | | __eq__ sum_{k__eq__n + 1}^{oo} | z_{k} | __lt__ epsilon/2__math__

__math__AA_{epsilon __gt__ 0} EE_{n_epsilon in NN_0} AA_{n __gt____eq__ n_epsilon}: sum_{k__eq__n_epsilon + 1}^{oo} |z_{k} | __lt__ epsilon/2__math__ und __math__|s_n -g| __lt__ epsilon/2__math__ mit __math__n_epsilon :__eq__ max{n_1__co__n_2}__math__

__math__{ sigma^{-1}(0)__co__ ...__co__sigma^{-1}(n_epsilon)} subseteq {0__co__1__co__ __co__m_epsilon}__math__ mit __math__m_epsilon :__eq__ max{ sigma^{-1}(0)__co__ ...__co__sigma^{-1}(n_epsilon)}__math__
__math__{ 0__co__...__co__ n_epsilon} subseteq {sigma(0)__co__sigma(1)__co__ ... __co__sigma(m_epsilon)}__math__
__math__AA_{epsilon __gt__ 0} EE_{m_epsilon in NN_0} AA_{m __gt__ m_epsilon}: |t_m - s_{n_epsilon}| __lt____eq__ |sum_{k__eq__n_epsilon + 1}^{oo} |z_{k} | __lt__ epsilon/2__math__
__math__AA_{m__gt__m_epsilon} : |t_m-g| __eq__ |t_m - s_{n_epsilon} + s_{n_epsilon} - g| __math__ mit __math__m_epsilon __gt____eq__ n_epsilon :__eq__ max{ n_1__co__ n_2 }__math__
__math__ |t_m - s_{n_epsilon} | + | s_{n_epsilon} - g| __math__
__math__ epsilon/2 + epsilon/2 __eq__ epsilon__math__
Insgesamt folgt: __math__AA_{epsilon __gt__ 0} EE_{n_2 in NN_0} AA_{n __gt____eq__ n_2}: |t_n -g| __lt__ epsilon__math__
__math__sigma: NN_0 -__gt__ NN_0__math__ ist die bijektive Abbildung der Umordnung __math__AA_{n in NN_0} : w_{sigma(n)} __eq__ z_n__math__
Sei __math__(t_n)_{n in NN_0}__math__ mit __math__t_n :__eq__ sum_{k__eq__0}^{n} w_{k}__math__ die Partialsummenfolge zur Reihe __math__sum_{k__eq__0}^{oo} w_{k}__math__.
Sei __math__g__math__ der Grenzwert der Partialsummenfolge __math__(s_n)_{n in NN_0}__math__ mit __math__s_n :__eq__ sum_{k__eq__0}^{n} z_{k}__math__ f__ue__r alle __math__n in NN_0__math__.
__math__AA_{epsilon __gt__ 0} EE_{n_1 in NN_0} AA_{n __gt____eq__ n_1}: |s_n -g| __eq__ | sum_{k__eq__n + 1}^{oo} z_{k} | __lt__ epsilon/2__math__

Sei __math__g_a__math__ der Grenzwert der absoluten Partialsummenfolge __math__(a_n)_{n in NN_0}__math__ mit __math__a_n :__eq__ sum_{k__eq__0}^{n} |z_{k}|__math__ f__ue__r alle __math__n in NN_0__math__.
__math__AA_{epsilon __gt__ 0} EE_{n_2 in NN_0} AA_{n __gt____eq__ n_2}: |a_n -g| __eq__ | sum_{k__eq__n+1}^{oo} | z_{k} | | __eq__ sum_{k__eq__n + 1}^{oo} | z_{k} | __lt__ epsilon/2__math__

__math__AA_{epsilon __gt__ 0} EE_{n_epsilon in NN_0} AA_{n __gt____eq__ n_epsilon}: sum_{k__eq__n_epsilon + 1}^{oo} |z_{k} | __lt__ epsilon/2__math__ und __math__|s_n -g| __lt__ epsilon/2__math__ mit __math__n_epsilon :__eq__ max{n_1__CO__n_2}__math__

__math__{ sigma^{-1}(0)__CO__ ...__CO__sigma^{-1}(n_epsilon)} subseteq {0__CO__1__CO__ __CO__m_epsilon}__math__ mit __math__m_epsilon :__eq__ max{ sigma^{-1}(0)__CO__ ...__CO__sigma^{-1}(n_epsilon)}__math__
__math__{ 0__CO__...__CO__ n_epsilon} subseteq {sigma(0)__CO__sigma(1)__CO__ ... __CO__sigma(m_epsilon)}__math__
__math__AA_{epsilon __gt__ 0} EE_{m_epsilon in NN_0} AA_{m __gt__ m_epsilon}: |t_m - s_{n_epsilon}| __lt____eq__ |sum_{k__eq__n_epsilon + 1}^{oo} |z_{k} | __lt__ epsilon/2__math__
__math__AA_{m__gt__m_epsilon} : |t_m-g| __eq__ |t_m - s_{n_epsilon} + s_{n_epsilon} - g| __math__ mit __math__m_epsilon __gt____eq__ n_epsilon :__eq__ max{ n_1__CO__ n_2 }__math__
__math__ |t_m - s_{n_epsilon} | + | s_{n_epsilon} - g| __math__
__math__ epsilon/2 + epsilon/2 __eq__ epsilon__math__
Insgesamt folgt: __math__AA_{epsilon __gt__ 0} EE_{n_2 in NN_0} AA_{n __gt____eq__ n_2}: |t_n -g| __lt__ epsilon__math__
